DOC.brief_summary: Observational study aim describe adherence population adolescent child treat quetiapine first psychotic episode whose important secondary objective identify possible predictive factor influence adherence treatment Quetiapine
DOC.criteria: At least one psychotic symptom ( delusion hallucination ) age 18 . Start treatment maximum period 2 year onset first psychotic symptom Written inform consent parent guardians patient . Pregnancy lactancy High risk aggression suicidal behaviour Alcohol dependence
